ResumeParserData.Experience: Marketing Manager  Google, London, UK  June 2018 - Present  Led the development and execution of comprehensive marketing strategies, driving brand awareness and customer engagement.  Managed cross-functional teams to deliver successful marketing campaigns across digital and traditional channels.  Analyzed market trends and customer data to inform marketing strategies and campaign decisions.  Collaborated with product teams to align marketing initiatives with business objectives.  Created and managed content for various marketing platforms, including social media, email, and the company website.  Monitored and reported on campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.  Digital Marketing Specialist  Amazon, London, UK  April 2014 - May 2018  Developed and implemented digital marketing strategies to drive online traffic and sales.  Managed SEO, PPC, and social media campaigns, optimizing performance and ROI.  Conducted market research to identify trends and opportunities for growth.  Created and curated content for digital marketing channels, enhancing brand presence and engagement.  Analyzed campaign performance data, providing regular reports and actionable insights to senior management.  Marketing Coordinator  Unilever, London, UK  August 2011 - March 2014  Coordinated marketing activities and campaigns, ensuring timely execution and alignment with brand strategy.  Assisted in the development of marketing materials, including brochures, flyers, and social media content.  Supported market research efforts, gathering data to inform marketing strategies.  Managed relationships with external vendors and partners to facilitate marketing initiatives.  Monitored and reported on marketing campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations.

JobProfile.Title: Marketing Manager
JobProfile.Alias: manager mgr, mktg manager, marketing department manager, marketing support manager, marketing team mgr, marketing team manager, manager-marketing, marketing- manager, marketing mngr, market business head, market management expert, manager marketing, product planning, manager marketing, marketing mgr, marketing incharge, general manager marketing, mgr marketing, manager- marketing, marketing management professional, manager, marketing, manager, market management, manager business marketing, division marketing manager, business marketing manager, manager of marketing, market manager, manager - marketing, markets manager, manager  marketing, marketing mgr -business

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Led the development and execution of comprehensive marketing strategies, driving brand awareness and customer engagement. 
 Managed cross-functional teams to deliver successful marketing campaigns across digital and traditional channels. 
 Analyzed market trends and customer data to inform marketing strategies and campaign decisions. 
 Collaborated with product teams to align marketing initiatives with business objectives. 
 Created and managed content for various marketing platforms, including social media, email, and the company website. 
 Monitored and reported on campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.

JobProfile.Title: Digital Marketing Specialist
JobProfile.Alias: digital campaign specialist, digital transformation marketing specialist, internet advertising specialist, digital media marketing specialist, specialist - digital marketing, digital marketer specialist, online marketing specialist, e marketing specialist, internet marketing specialist, specialist of digital marketing, specialist digital marketing, digital services marketing specialist, marketing specialist digital, expert marketing digital, digital advertising specialist, digital advertiser, digital advertising expert, digital marketing experts, digital marketing expert, digital marketing analytics specialist, digital marketing professional, expert digital marketing, strategic digital marketing specialist, digital-marketing specialist, digital mktg specialist

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Developed and implemented digital marketing strategies to drive online traffic and sales. 
 Managed SEO, PPC, and social media campaigns, optimizing performance and ROI. 
 Conducted market research to identify trends and opportunities for growth. 
 Created and curated content for digital marketing channels, enhancing brand presence and engagement. 
 Analyzed campaign performance data, providing regular reports and actionable insights to senior management.

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Coordinated marketing activities and campaigns, ensuring timely execution and alignment with brand strategy. 
 Assisted in the development of marketing materials, including brochures, flyers, and social media content. 
 Supported market research efforts, gathering data to inform marketing strategies. 
 Managed relationships with external vendors and partners to facilitate marketing initiatives. 
 Monitored and reported on marketing campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Experienced Marketing Specialist with over 8 years in the marketing industry. Expertise in developing and executing marketing strategies, managing campaigns, and analyzing market trends. Strong background in digital marketing, content creation, and brand management.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: James has an experience in the domain of 'Management of Companies and Enterprises', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Advertising, Marketing, Promotions, Public Relations, and Sales Managers. The candidate has been working as a Marketing Manager at Google for the last 6.2 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, James holds a Mid Management Level position, as Marketing Manager at Google. from 01/06/2018 to 15/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 6.2 years in this company.

James holds a Low Management Level position, as Marketing Coordinator at Unilever. from 01/08/2011 to 31/03/2014. The candidate has a total experience of 2.8 years in this company.

James Brown
Manchester, UK
james.brown@email.com	,+44 321 654 9870	,LinkedIn : linkedin.com/in/jamesbrown

Professional Summary
Experienced Marketing Specialist with over 8 years in the marketing industry. Expertise in developing and executing marketing strategies, managing campaigns, and analyzing market trends. Strong background in digital marketing, content creation, and brand management.

Professional Experience
Marketing Manager
Google, London, UK
June 2018 - Present
Led the development and execution of comprehensive marketing strategies, driving brand awareness and customer engagement.
Managed cross-functional teams to deliver successful marketing campaigns across digital and traditional channels.
Analyzed market trends and customer data to inform marketing strategies and campaign decisions.
Collaborated with product teams to align marketing initiatives with business objectives.
Created and managed content for various marketing platforms, including social media, email, and the company website.
Monitored and reported on campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
Digital Marketing Specialist
Amazon, London, UK
April 2014 - May 2018
Developed and implemented digital marketing strategies to drive online traffic and sales.
Managed SEO, PPC, and social media campaigns, optimizing performance and ROI.
Conducted market research to identify trends and opportunities for growth.
Created and curated content for digital marketing channels, enhancing brand presence and engagement.
Analyzed campaign performance data, providing regular reports and actionable insights to senior management.
Marketing Coordinator
Unilever, London, UK
August 2011 - March 2014
Coordinated marketing activities and campaigns, ensuring timely execution and alignment with brand strategy.
Assisted in the development of marketing materials, including brochures, flyers, and social media content.
Supported market research efforts, gathering data to inform marketing strategies.
Managed relationships with external vendors and partners to facilitate marketing initiatives.
Monitored and reported on marketing campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations.
